DataQuery.description:
These are the common properties available to all queries in all datasources.
Specific implementations will *extend* this interface, adding the required
properties for the given context.

hide.description: true if query is disabled (ie should not be returned to the dashboard)

key.description: Unique, guid like, string used in explore mode

queryType.description:
Specify the query flavor
TODO make this required and give it a default

datasource.description:
For mixed data sources the selected datasource is on the query level.
For non mixed scenarios this is undefined.
TODO find a better way to do this ^ that's friendly to schema
TODO this shouldn't be unknown but DataSourceRef | null

profileTypeId.description: Specifies the type of profile to query.
